TextBlock.Text: Kestrel: This is where I last saw Lotus before I headed back to the <color=orange>Escape Pod</color>.
Solara: Where did you two go before you parted ways?
Kestrel: We had found two structures, one on a small island and one amongst the cliffs. The gigantic cube structure above us wasn't there until I came to check on the signal hijacker.
Kestrel: I just had the strangest feeling. As if somehow, Lotus was standing right here. Not next to us, but exactly where we're standing.
Solara: ...You're not going crazy, are you? Is the air here making you go crazy?
Kestrel: Hopefully not. But anyways, I know the only places we -- or at least before spliting up, I haven't checked the rivers.
Solara: If you've already checked out the island, I guess that only leaves the smaller rivers.
